short_summary: Supply and delivery of 121 compact (mini) refrigerators
full_summary:
### Compact Refrigerators Tender

__Estimated Value:__ $ Cuomo001PRO

__Closing Date:__ January 13th, 2023 at 14:00 hours
(Remember to submit your tender at least 2 hours prior to the closing time to allow for any technical issues)

### Solicitation Details

- **Contract Ref:** 202202569
- **Type of Contract:** Request for Proposal
- **Award Method:** Competitive Open Bidding
- **Commodity Code:** N4110 (Refrigeration Equipment)
- **Industry:** Service-Based Bid 

### Tender Description

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) invites qualified bidders to submit their proposals for the supply and delivery of 121 compact (mini) refrigeraators. 

*The contract will be awarded to the lowest compliant bidder, with expected delivery dates by March 31st, 2023.*

**Method of Payment:**

All payments will be made in accordance with the **Public Services and Procurement Canada's Integrity Regime**, administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada.

**Notice:**

* This solicitation may be amended, and all amendments will be posted on the [Public Services and Procurement Canada's website](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders).
* Amended files (RFP/a__ clears turn)) may be viewed under solicitations on the website.
* Bidders are advised to refer to the above mentioned website frequently to obtain the latest information regarding this solicitation. 

### Request for Proposal

Bidders shall submit their proposals, as outlined in [attached Request for Proposal documents](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/11/bc9e9e6102c326aac0a6f1ac2b97efc8/202202569a_solicitation_amdt_003_en.pdf) located on the Canada Buys website.

Instructions to bidders can be accessed at https://buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders. 

*Public Services and Procurement Canada is not responsible for listing information and/or errors within these documents.*

In summary, this is a competitive Open Bidding tender seeking Qualified bidders with experience in refridgeration equipment  sales to provide 121 compact (mini) refridgerators under a service-based contract. The contractual details reflect the standards outlined by the **Integrity Regime** administered by **Public Services and Procurement Canada**. Submissions must be received by January 13
